explains: n. 口琴（等于 mouth organ）

sentences.en: He played a tune on his harmonica.
sentences.cn: 他用口琴吹奏了一支曲子。

sentences.en: He made a harmonica out of the corncob.
sentences.cn: 他用玉米棒子做了一把口琴。

sentences.en: When he picked up a harmonica, he learned to play it in hours.
sentences.cn: 当他拿起口琴时，他在几个小时内就学会了吹。
